name: NeonPowerUp!
description:
NeonPowerUp! is set in a beautifully pixelated world full of obstacles and challenges. Set in a deadly future where artificial intelligence has gone mad, your task is to restore all the batteries in the world.

Obtain power-ups that grant the player different specific abilities to clear each stage.
Overcome thediverse and dynamic challenges that await you on each level!

Features
  • Puzzle platform gameplay
  • 80 levels
  • Unique power-ups
  • Pixel art graphics
  • Chiptune music
